title.narrative: Procurement of Services for Support to Education Strategic Plan

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of Services for Support to Education Strategic Plan) is a component of Support to Education Strategic Plan in Ghana reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £2,211,718. This component benefits Ghana, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Camfed International, Coffey International Development, Crown Agents Limited, Ghana Center for Democratic Development , Innovations for Poverty Action, Mott MacDonald Limited, Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 01-07-2006 and the end date is 31-12-2013.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
